sqls.sql: SELECT UNIQUE_CODE FROM TX_USER where OPENID = :OPENID
select UNIQUE_CODE, SUMMARY 订单, TOTAL_AMT 金额, STATUS 状态, to_char(CREATE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') 创建时间 from TX_ORDER where USER_UC = :USER_UC order by CREATE_TIME desc
select p.name as 产品名称, oi.PRODUCT_COUNT as 数量, oi.TOTAL_AMT as 金额 from TX_ORDER_ITEM oi left join TX_PRODUCT p on oi.PRODUCT_UC = p.UNIQUE_CODE where oi.ORDER_UC = :ORDER_UC
SELECT UNIQUE_CODE ,NAME as 名称,PRICE as 单价, to_char(CREATE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') 创建时间 FROM TX_PRODUCT
SELECT p.UNIQUE_CODE , p.NAME ,p.PRICE,pd.REMARK FROM TX_PRODUCT p left join TX_PRODUCT_DETAIL pd on p.UNIQUE_CODE = pd.UNIQUE_CODE
SELECT count(1) FROM TX_SHOPPING_CART where USER_UC = :USER_UC
SELECT PRODUCT_COUNT FROM TX_SHOPPING_CART where USER_UC = :USER_UC and PRODUCT_UC = :PRODUCT_UC
MERGE INTO TX_SHOPPING_CART(UNIQUE_CODE, USER_UC, PRODUCT_UC, PRODUCT_COUNT) KEY(USER_UC, PRODUCT_UC) values(:UNIQUE_CODE, :USER_UC, :PRODUCT_UC, :PRODUCT_COUNT)
SELECT s.UNIQUE_CODE, P.NAME 名称, s.PRODUCT_COUNT 数量 FROM TX_SHOPPING_CART S, TX_PRODUCT P where s.PRODUCT_UC = p.UNIQUE_CODE and s.USER_UC = :USER_UC
